      • getPost

        @POST
@Produces(value="text/html")
public java.lang.String getPost()
        Simple method processing HTTP POST requests, producing "text/html" media type.
        Returns:
        String with message

        Example request:
        POST /jersey2x/api/test-resource HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Host: localhost:8090

        Example response:
        HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: text/html

        Hello from POST

      • getFirstSecond

        @GET
@Path(value="{first}-{second}")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String getFirstSecond(@PathParam(value="first")
                                                java.lang.String first,
                                                @PathParam(value="second")
                                                java.lang.String second)
        Method processing HTTP GET requests with parameter parsing, producing "text/plain" MIME media type.
        Returns:
        String that will be send back as a response of type "text/plain".

        Example request:
        GET /jersey2x/api/test-resource/111-222 HTTP/1.1
        Host: localhost:8090

        Example response:
        HTTP/1.1 200 OK
        Content-Type: text/plain

        First: 111 Second: 222
